overview: Melanie is an ambitious attorney enjoying an open marriage with Jason. Jason is a photographer who likes to watch his wife have sex with other men and take pictures of their trysts. Together they are a passionate and adventurous couple inspiring each other to discover new levels of intimacy. When Melanie turns the tables to watch her husband engage in a lusty threesome with gal pals Camillia and Steph, she experiences a profound revelation that empowers her with new-found confidence to pursue her life's other ambitions.
title: The Wife Watcher
